import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import './Booking.css'; const apiuser = 'http://localhost:9999/user' //const apiBooking = "http://localhost:9999/booking" export default class Booking extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state= { startdate : "", enddate : "", typeroom: "" } } componentWillMount(){ console.log("willmount") const config = { headers: { Authorization : localStorage.getItem('token') } } // api axios นำ email มาแสดง axios.get(apiuser,config) .then( res => { // เซต Email มาแสดง this.setState({ id: res.data[0].id }) console.log("componentWillMount id : ", this.state.id) }, err => { console.log(err) } ) } render() { console.log("renderBooking") return (
